name: Fractal Chicken
description: Explore, craft, fight, and build your way through multiple infinite voxel worlds, look at fractals, have a good time! Play multiple game modes, builld automated machines, chop trees, build a base, turn into a helicopter, upgrade weapons and equipment and more! Oh, and most importantly, awaken true fractal power!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 600 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
